text: Feroze Gandhi or "Ghandy" Born 12 September 1912, Mumbai Died: 8 September 1960, New Delhi Full name: Feroze Jehangir Ghandy Spouse: Indira Gandhi (m. 1942â€“1960) Resting place: Prayagraj Parents: Faredoon Jehangir Ghandy, Ratimai Commissariat He was an Indian freedom fighter, politician and journalist. He published the newspapers The National Herald and The Navjivan. He served as a member of the provincial parliament between 1950 and 1952, and was later a member of the Lok Sabha, the Lower House of India's parliament. He was born in Mumbai to Indian Parsi parents and he later married Indira Gandhi. ==References== Category:Members of the Lok Sabha Category:1912 births Category:1960 deaths Category:Politicians from Mumbai Category:Indian journalists Category:Publishers
title: Feroze Gandhi
